description: Forward - amplifies KanMX from deletion collection. Will amplify uptag.
Forward - amplifies KanMX from deletion collection. Will NOT amplify uptag. Can be used to amplify KanMX4 from pFA6 plasmid.
Reverse - amplifies KanMX from deletion collection. Will amplify downtag.
Reverse - amplifies KanMX from deletion collection. Will NOT amplify downtag. Can be used to amplify KanMX4 from pFA6 plasmid.
Reverse - internal KanMX primer. Can be used to sequence UPTAG.
Forward - internal KanMX primer. Can be used to sequence DOWNTAG.
Reverse - amplifies KanMX from deletion collection. Will amplify downtag. Adds B homology tail
Forward - amplifies KanMX from deletion collection. Will amplify uptag. Adds A homology tail
Reverse - internal KanMX primer. Used to sequence UPTAG
Forward - internal KanMX primer. Used to sequence DOWNTAG
